hadiths.text: Uqbah bin 'Amir narrated that:The Messenger of Allah [SAW] used to tell his wives not to wear jewelry and silk. He said: "If you want the jewelry and silk of Paradise, then do not wear them in this world

chapter.ara-name: باب الْكَرَاهِيَةِ لِلنِّسَاءِ فِي إِظْهَارِ الْحُلِيِّ وَالذَّهَبِ
chapter.eng-name: Dislike for Women to Show Their Jewelry and Gold
